caseTitle: Aman Ullah v. Mst. Ghulam Bibi & others
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE ANWAR ZAHEER JAMALI, CJ
tagline: The provisions of Section 154 Cr.P.C. are to be read in a pragmatic, holistic and realistic manner in order to ensure that its true spirit and object is achieved and it is not abused at the hands of individuals or police, who may be adamant to make mockery of this system. It is for these reasons that no definite principle can be laid down barring the registration of another FIR.
